resources.string: A multi-fragment app that lets you play with counters while wandering through fragments
Libraries used: \n• FragNav - github.com/ncapdevi/FragNav \n• StateSaver - github.com/evernote/android-state
An MVVM app that lets you search for movies through a REST movie API

Libraries used: 
• Retrofit - github.com/square/retrofit 
• RxAndroid - github.com/ReactiveX/RxAndroid 
• MultiStateView - github.com/Kennyc1012/MultiStateView 
• BRVAH - github.com/CymChad/BaseRecyclerViewAdapterHelper 
• StateSaver - github.com/evernote/android-state
Dagger (github.com/google/dagger), Data Binding, and Architecture Components are used throughout the app.
